name: Trafalgar Law
text: On Play: If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Then, your [Donquixote Rosinante] and your [Heart Pirates] type Characters get +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
